title: Terraformer
summaries: The Terraformer is a Hardmode, post-Moon Lord tool. It has the same effects as a Clentaminator but reaches 95 tiles and has a width of 7 tiles and has a 33% chance to not consume Solutions, compared to the Clentaminator which reaches 60 tiles and has a width of 5 tiles. The Terraformer can only be obtained by throwing a Clentaminator into Shimmer after the Moon Lord has been defeated.
The Terraformer cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have <linked>modifiers</linked>.
